attributes.description: Immaculate condition, Perfect Family Vehicle, FEATURES Include Airbags, Aircon, Alloy Wheels, Auto Headlights, Auto Wipers, Central Locking, Cruise Control, Electric Mirrors Windows, Electric Tailgate, Electric Seat, Fog Lights, Leather Interior, MultiFunction Steering, Navigation, Panoramic Sunroof, PDC,360 Degree Reverse Camera, Tow Bar, LED Lights, Radio/CD/MP3 Player with AUX USB Port, Bluetooth. Finance can be arranged. Excludes administration, delivery, and License Registration Fees. 80 Point quality check. Very neat. Tradeins accepted. Test drives welcome. Nationwide delivery. Finance Is available with all the major banks as we are approved dealers. Please Come and visit our preowned manager and our business manager, they will be able to arrange a Taylormade deal structure to match your pocket over a lovely cup of coffee at our bistro. Tradeins welcome and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. First time to finance, our finance and insurance manager will assist you step by step throughout your process. There are great warranty options available for this vehicle and other great products. Should you require further information, or you would like to arrange a test drive please do not hesitate to contact us at Auto Baltic Midrand.
